articles.author: marcs
articles.title: Update to nvidia-dkms-390.25-4 can't use CUDA anymore
articles.description: I updated to the lastest 4.15 kernel and the latest nvidia-dkms version, module builds fine, but now I can't see my GTX 980 in clinfo, as the nvidia-utils package suggested I ran nvidia-modprobe but I still can't see my CUDA device on clinfo. Can someone sugg…
